nike.name: Nike Air Max 1
nike.detail: The Nike Air Max 1 gives fresh a whole new meaning. The '90s classic brings in flowers and mixed materials to add some spring to your step every time you lace up.

nike.name: Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8
nike.detail: The Nike Air Force 1 maintains its iconic statement design you know and love, plus a touch of our favorite blooms and colors during this time of year.

nike.name: Nike Air VaporMax 2020 FK
nike.detail: Designed with sustainability in mind, the Nike Air VaporMax 2020 Flyknit is made from at least 50% recycled content by weight. That’s a lot of trash! As part of Nike’s journey towards lowering our impact, we’re discovering new ways to put our waste to good use. By utilizing leftover materials, recycled polyester, recycled foam, and a Nike Air sole made from at least 75% recycled TPU, the VaporMax 2020 Flyknit marks the next step towards our ultimate goal of zero carbon and zero waste.

nike.name: Air Jordan 1 Mid
nike.detail: The Air Jordan 1 Mid Shoe is inspired by the first AJ1, offering OG fans a look at how far the Jordan brand has come since 1985.

nike.name: Jordan Zoom Trunner Advance
nike.detail: Designed for athletes who want a shoe they can run or train in, the Jordan Zoom Trunner Advance offers support in all directions. It features a radically new diamond-like cage that helps stabilize your side-to-side motions. Responsive cushioning helps drive you forward.

nike.name: Jordan Zoom '92
nike.detail: A nod to '90s basketball shoes, the Jordan Zoom '92 focuses on comfort while tapping into the irreverent spirit of that era's designs. A stretchy fit sleeve and underfoot cushioning offer a comfortable fit. '90s-inspired details give the shoe its retro flavor.

nike.name: Nike Alpha Menace Elite 2
nike.detail: The Nike Alpha Menace Elite 2 is built for the athlete who thrives on power and speed. Its Nike Flyknit upper provides stretch and support for quick cuts on the field and a TPU plate adds extra stability for the elite player.

nike.name: Nike Force Savage Pro 2
nike.detail: The Nike Force Savage Pro 2 is made for the front line. Textured synthetic leather makes it durable, and a hook-and-loop ankle strap is easy to adjust.
nike.img1: The Nike Force Savage Pro 2 is made for the front line. Textured synthetic leather makes it durable, and a hook-and-loop ankle strap is easy to adjust.

nike.name: Nike Force Savage Elite 2
nike.detail: Dig in with the Nike Force Savage Elite 2. Its durable exterior is detailed with molding at the toe. A Nike Fastflex outsole sets you up with an articulate design so you can freely move in every direction.

nike.name: Nike Air Zoom BB NXT
nike.detail: Keep your focus on the game in the new Air Zoom BB NXT from Nike Basketball. It's designed to help players feel light, secure and responsive. You get energy back with every step, helping to turn your force into momentum when it matters most.

adidas.name: NMD_R1
adidas.detail: It takes practice to perfect your fade. An expert flip in your wrist to master the flare. The right spray paint, rollers and tips to complete your masterpiece. Just like your graffiti, these adidas NMD_R1 Shoes keep the streets alive with color. A fade along the cushioned midsole brings fresh style and comfort along wherever your art takes you.

adidas.name: NMD_R1 V2
adidas.detail: Time is flying. There's no question about that. Enjoy every speeding second of it. Take it a step further, and be the one to set the fast pace of the day in these adidas NMD_R1 V2 Shoes. Looking back to the world of running, these shoes show off the same progressive and pioneering aesthetic that made waves in the '80s. Let them infuse you with that attitude for today.

adidas.name: SUPERNOVA
adidas.detail: When you're ready to get serious about running, you're ready for adidas Supernova Shoes. They're designed with a mesh upper that has extra airflow where you sweat the most. Flexible cushioning in the forefoot combines with responsive cushioning in the heel to give you a comfortable ride. And because we're serious about creating a healthier environment, these shoes are built with recycled materials

adidas.name: PREDATOR MUTATOR
adidas.detail: Your confidence consumes them. Your vision leaves them with nowhere to hide. Seize your unfair advantage and take control in these adidas Predator Mutator 20+ soccer cleats. Their laceless knit textile upper hugs your foot for a true 360-degree fit. Needle-sharp rubber spines add unmatched grip, helping you add whip to cross-field passes and free kicks. The split outsole digs in to boss matches on firm ground.

adidas.name: NEMEZIZ
adidas.detail: Dodge expectations. Zig when they think you'll zag. Pass when they expect you to move. Unlock agility and power your unpredictability in adidas Nemeziz. The compressive, flexible upper on these firm ground soccer cleats keeps you securely locked in without limiting your play. With no laces required, there's more room for manipulating the ball. A split outsole flexes with your footwork as you run rings around your rivals.

adidas.name: NEMEZIZ MESSI
adidas.detail: Dodge expectations. Zig when they think you'll zag. Pass when they expect you to move. Unlock agility and power your unpredictability in adidas Nemeziz. Showing off Lionel Messi's distinctive logo, these firm ground soccer cleats have a stretchy upper that offers quick access and locks you down without limiting your game. The split outsole flexes with every jink and turn to help you lay down next-level moves.

adidas.name: HARDEN VOL. 4
adidas.detail: James Harden and adidas Basketball teamed up to create a signature shoe made for dynamic on-court moves. The innovative rubber outsole is specifically tailored to Harden's game, so you can cut, move and step back just like the MVP. Ultra-lightweight cushioning in the midsole won't slow down your light speed dashes to the hole.

adidas.name: N3XT L3V3L 2020
adidas.detail: Stand for love and inclusivity on court. These laceless adidas basketball shoes are designed in honor of Pride. The supportive upper rides an ultralight midsole, giving you game-long comfort and precise control. The rubber outsole provides great grip, so you can stop on a dime and watch your opponent go flying by.

adidas.name: T-MAC 1 MCDONALD'S
adidas.detail: Same game, different flavor. Tracy McGrady had a style of play unlike anyone who came before him. For this version of his signature shoes, adidas teamed up with McDonald's for a design inspired by their beloved sauce packets.

adidas.name: VS PACE
adidas.detail: Easy low-top style. These guys' shoes are made with a nubuck-like upper. Contrast 3-Stripes appear on the outer side of the foot, while the 3-Stripes on the inner side are subtle and perforated.

reebok.name: NANO X HERO
reebok.detail: First responders save lives every day, but there's nothing ordinary about them. These men's Nano X Hero Shoes honor first responders and the work they do outside the box and the effort they give inside the box. Special details remind us that not all heroes wear capes.

reebok.name: FLASHFILM TRAINER
reebok.detail: Go all out. Recover. Repeat. These men's training shoes are made for intense stop-and-start workouts. The textile upper stretches and provides support where it's needed most. A polyurethane midsole gives you a responsive and comfortable feel.

reebok.name: REEBOK NANO
reebok.detail: To celebrate the 10th anniversary of the Nano, Reebok has reimagined this iconic shoe beloved by the training community. This men's version has a soft woven textile upper with targeted areas of support and stretch. Lightweight cushioning keeps you fast on your feet.

reebok.name: CLASSIC LEATHER LEGACY
reebok.detail: Rad '70s running style reimagined. These Classic Legacy shoes take their design inspiration from old-school trainers. A sculpted 3D look gives the midsole a fierce attitude. Bold colors pop for a standout look. The upper mixes suede and textile for extra texture and depth.

reebok.name: QUESTION MID MEN'S BASKETBALL
reebok.detail: The crown jewel of Reebok's basketball archive. These men's Question mid-cut shoes are part of Allen 'The Answer' Iverson's signature collection. The upper gets a rugged update with a neoprene upper and a hit of leather on the toe. Hexagonal cushioning and tonal embroidered logos keep their look legit.

reebok.name: FOREVER FLOATRIDE ENERGY 2
reebok.detail: These men's neutral running shoes offer cushioned comfort without sacrificing flexibility and ground feel. They keep feet light with a breathable mesh upper. The Floatride Energy Foam gives the shoes a soft step-in feel and ultra-smooth ride.

reebok.name: ZIGWILD TRAIL 6
reebok.detail: Wherever your run takes you, channel the feeling of mountain vistas and quiet, tree-canopied trails. These men's running shoes were inspired by '90s trail runners. A mix of suede, leather, textile and synthetic gives the upper a layered look with an outdoor vibe. The innovative outsole disperses energy for a comfortable feel from heel-strike to toe-off.

reebok.name: LIQUIFECT 180
reebok.detail: Speed up your turnover. These men's running shoes have cushioning that pads your heel strikes and propels you forward. The soft, breathable textile upper keeps your feet cool while you traverse hot patches of pavement. The textured rubber outsole is made to grip on slippery bridges.

reebok.name: KAMIKAZE II
reebok.detail: The Kamikaze II updates the groundbreaking '90s basketball silhouette for the street. These men's shoes are done in a mix of tumbled leather and synthetic nubuck, with blocks of color in a bold zigzag design. Hexalite delivers time-tested cushioning.

reebok.name: ERIC EMANUEL QUESTION
reebok.detail: Lace up legit B-ball style. These men's Question Mid shoes are a collaboration with Eric Emanuel, a NY-based streetwear designer known for his basketball-themed collections. This take on Allen Iverson's first signature shoe pairs the clean white leather upper with a pearlized toe and pops of Emanuel's signature pink color. A translucent outsole and hexagonal cushioning show off iconic court-inspired design.

underarmour.name: Project Rock 2 Training
underarmour.detail: Project Rock training gear was built to help you find boundaries, then push right through them. These stability gym shoes, like everything in this collection was approved by Dwayne Johnson, the hardest worker in any room.

underarmour.name: Adult UA Curry 7 TB
underarmour.detail: Steph went from a 3-star recruit to a 3x world champion because he's focused and knows how to control the court. These team color basketball shoes are built to respond quickly, keep you stable, and let you cover more ground.

underarmour.name: Grade School UA Curry 7 IWD
underarmour.detail: The Curry 7 Bamazing colorway will support opportunities for young women to reach their dreams, most notably through the annual education scholarship started in 2019 by Stephen and Ayesha Curry's Eat.Learn.Play foundation and Under Armour.

underarmour.name: UA Spieth 4 GORE-TEX®
underarmour.detail: This is the most data-driven, obsessed-over, tested, and designed golf shoe we've ever built. Just the way Jordan wanted it. Because he's all about the numbers. All you need to know is that it has the power and control needed for a major champion.

underarmour.name: UA HOVR™ STRT
underarmour.detail: The idea here was simple—use our amazing, energy-returning UA HOVR cushioning to build the perfect go-anywhere shoes. They're clean, sleek, light, and super-comfy.

underarmour.name: Unisex UA HOVR™ Summit
underarmour.detail: These unisex hiking shoes are built to go anywhere, packed with tech developed for running and outdoors: UA HOVR™ cushioning from our running shoes, a Michelin bottom inspired by bike tires, and overlays for stability.

underarmour.name: UA HOVR™ Sonic 3 Team
underarmour.detail: The UA HOVR™ Sonic has been a no-brainer for runners who like distance but want more flexibility. And now, with real-time Form Coaching from UA MapMyRun™, the UA HOVR™ Sonic 3 also helps you become a better runner.

underarmour.name: UA Harper 4 Turf Baseball
underarmour.detail: Synthetic upper is lightweight & durable with 3D print for added abrasion. Adjustable ankle strap locks you in with powerful stability & support. Full-length EVA midsole helps disperse cleat pressure & provides ideal comfort & cushioning. Rubber molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability for all field surfaces. Bryce Harper logo & signature details throughout

underarmour.name: UA Harper 4 Mid RM Baseball
underarmour.detail: Synthetic upper is lightweight & durable with 3D print for added abrasion. Adjustable ankle strap locks you in with powerful stability & support. Full-length EVA midsole helps disperse cleat pressure & provides ideal comfort & cushioning. Rubber molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability for all field surfaces. Bryce Harper logo & signature details throughout

underarmour.name: UA Threadborne Slingwrap
underarmour.detail: These running shoes feel light and unrestrictive, but have that midsole strap that still locks you in so you get the support you need.
